scripts.say: Bah. I thought we had a big one on the hook; turns out it's just you twerps.
I am Glorious, aircraft carrier of the Royal Navy! I will have you know that I'm not a twerp!
Furthermore, if you believe you can stop us on your own, then you're sorely mistaken! Why, the idea is laughable!
Huh?! You've got a lot of nerve, saying that to my face... Just hold still and I'll make this quick and painless!
